column1: Little Goat Diner////What can I say besides amazing? I thoroughly enjoyed my dining experience here. The service was incredible
column2: the food was excellent and the experience was more than up to par. We had the crab dip; which I strongly recommend. I had the Sloppy Goat - YESSSSS - we also had BBQ Pork
column5: and The Chickpea salad! All were awesome. If you don't know
column6: this restaurant is owned and the menu is created by a Iron Chef winner
column7: so I recommend you go. I don't know why it took me so long.
